q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

q2.answer: Yes! All paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.
q2.question: Is there a free trial?

q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise plans.
